sourcesContent:
import { Container, Row, Form, Button, Table, Col } from "react-bootstrap" import { Typeahead } from 'react-bootstrap-typeahead' import { useState } from "react"; import { FaPlusCircle, FaTrashAlt, FaEdit } from 'react-icons/fa'; import logo from '../../src/logo-shopper.png' import 'react-bootstrap-typeahead/css/Typeahead.css' export default function Order() { const [selected, setSelected] = useState([]); const [addedProducts, setAddedProducts] = useState([]); const [qty, setQty] = useState(""); const [total, setTotal] = useState(0); const products = [ { id: 1, name: "Name product", price: 20, qty_stock: 10 }, { id: 2, name: "Name product 2", price: 20, qty_stock: 10 }, { id: 3, name: "Name product 3", price: 20, qty_stock: 10 } ] const onChangeQty = (event) => { setQty(event.target.value) } const onClickAddedProduct = () => { if(qty <= 0) { alert('VocÃª precisa escolher a quantidade desejada.') return } const product = { id: selected[0].id, name: selected[0].name, price: selected[0].price, qty_stock: selected[0].qty_stock, qty: qty } const filteredProducts = addedProducts.filter(prod => { return prod.id != product.id }) setTotal(total + (product.price * product.qty)) setAddedProducts([...filteredProducts, product]) setSelected([]) setQty("") } const onClickDeleteProduct = (productId) => { const updatedProducts = addedProducts.filter(product => { return product.id != productId }) setAddedProducts(updatedProducts) } const onClickEditProduct = (product) => { setSelected([product]) setQty(product.qty) } const listAddedProducts = addedProducts.map(product => { return ( {product.name} {product.price.toLocaleString('pt-br', { style: 'currency', currency: 'BRL' })} {product.qty} ) }) return ( Cadastro de Pedidos
Nome cliente: Data de entrega: Adicionar produtos: { selected.length > 0 && Estoque: {selected[0].qty_stock} }
Produtos adicionados no pedido
 {listAddedProducts}
Produto PreÃ§o por unidade Quantidade #
Total: {total.toLocaleString('pt-br', { style: 'currency', currency: 'BRL' })} ) }
